Tim Rayburn

Technology is a means, not an end.

About Me

Consulting

Currently Tim works as a Principal Consultant at Improving Enterprises, helping organizations succeed with .NET projects, agile project management, and community engagement.

Learn More

Community

Tim is a recognized speaker throughout the country on matters .NET, Agile and career management. He has keynoted conferences, organized conferences, led user groups, and spoken at user groups hundreds of times.

Learn More

Creativity

Tim is a passionate gamer, both table-top gaming and computer gaming. As the former host of Radio Free Hommlet, a podcast dedicated to D&D 4th Edition and player of many MMORPGs he's always ready to discuss games.

Learn More

My Projects

Open Source that I have, or do, contribute to.

Highway Framework

Highway.Data is a set of NuGet packages which provide a testable, clean, reusable abstraction over various ORMs on the market today. Primarily focused on EntityFramework, this project embodies the best practices of working with data in .NET.

NUnit

NUnit is a unit-testing framework for all .Net languages. Initially ported from JUnit, the current production release, version 2.6, is the seventh major release of this xUnit based unit testing tool for Microsoft .NET. It is written entirely in C# and has been completely redesigned to take advantage of many .NET language features, for example custom attributes and other reflection related capabilities. NUnit brings xUnit to all .NET languages.
Need to get ahold of me? Have a project? Speaking engagement? OSS idea? Then reach out!
